pageTitle: 39 CFR 111.1 - Mailing Standards of the United States Postal Service, Domestic Mail Manual; incorporated by reference of regulations governing domestic mail services. | US Law | LII / Legal Information Institute
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {2696=On April 16, 2015, the Postal Service filed a notice of mailing services price adjustments with the Postal Regulatory Commission (PRC), effective May 31, 2015. This final rule contains the revisions to Mailing Standards of the United States Postal Service, Domestic Mail Manual (DMM®) to implement the changes coincident with the price adjustments and other minor DMM changes., 37684=Title 39 published on 2014-07-01, 10980=The Postal Service announces the issuance of the Mailing Standards of the United States Postal Service, Domestic Mail Manual (DMM®) dated January 25, 2015, and its incorporation by reference in the Code of Federal Regulations., 57836=In January 2015, the Postal Service TM filed a notice of mailing services price adjustments with the Postal Regulatory Commission (PRC), effective April 26, 2015. This proposed rule contains the revisions to Mailing Standards of the United States Postal Service, Domestic Mail Manual (DMM®) that we would adopt to implement the changes coincident with the price adjustments.}
textBeforeTable: Additional Documents GPO FDSys XML | Text 80 FR 25528 - New Mailing Standards for Domestic Mailing Services Products 2015-05-04; vol. 80 # 85 - Monday, May 4, 2015 For a complete list of all Rules, Proposed Rules, and Notices view the Rulemaking tab. The following are only the Rules published in the Federal Register after the published date of Title 39. Title 39 published on 2014-07-01. 70 FR 14535, Mar. 23, 2005] 69 FR 59139, Oct. 4, 2004; 62 FR 14827, Mar. 28, 1997, as amended at [ Federal Register when incorporated by reference therein with the approval of the Director of the Federal Register.” In conformity with that provision, and with 39 U.S.C. section 410(b)(1), and as provided in this part, the U.S. Postal Service hereby incorporates by reference in this part, the Mailing Standards of the United States Postal Service, Domestic Mail Manual, a looseleaf document published
textAfterTable: POSTAL SERVICE Final rule. Effective date: May 31, 2015. 39 CFR Part 111 Summary On April 16, 2015, the Postal Service filed a notice of mailing services price adjustments with the Postal Regulatory Commission (PRC), effective May 31, 2015. This final rule contains the revisions to Mailing Standards of the United States Postal Service, Domestic Mail Manual (DMM®) to implement the changes coincident with the price adjustments and other minor DMM changes. 2015-03-17; vol. 80 # 51 - Tuesday, March 17, 2015 80 FR 13767 - Clarification of Content Eligibility for Standard Mail Marketing Parcels GPO FDSys XML | Text Additional Documents type regulations.gov FR Doc. 2015-05885 RIN POSTAL SERVICE Final
